Description:
Spacious Family Home
This home is set on a large allotment of 568m2 in a popular Aurora Estate, within walking distance to Aurora Town Centre, local schools and a beautiful park perfect for a bbq just down the road.
Offers a wide formal entrance, comfortable lounge/rumpus, beautiful kitchen including stainless steel appliances & stone bench top with open plan living area filed with natural light leading to alfresco and huge backyard.
Boasting 4 large bedrooms, built in robes to all bedrooms, master bedroom with full ensuite & walk in robe, laundry and central bathroom. Further features includes the comfort of ducted heating, split system cooling, ceiling fans, alarm, down lights, double remote garage with internal access, ample storage options and 3 kw solar panels.
This property would be your best investment for years to come. Don't miss out this time.
Insights: 99 other 4 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
Mortgagee Auction
A great opportunity for any investor or occupier to enjoy the benefits of this beautifully presented apartment only minutes away from Lyndarum shopping center, Epping Views primary school, public transport and so much more.
On offer is a two bedroom apartment with mirrored build in robes, quality bathroom and laundry, large open plan living area which leads to your very own private balcony, modern kitchen with stone bench tops.
Other features include secure undercover car park with storage. Ideal first home or a great investment opportunity.
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.

Description:
Your Opportunity Awaits
Nestled in a family friendly area of Epping with in short proximity of Epping and South Morang Train station, public transport, Pacific Epping, Westfield Shopping Centre, Primary and Secondary schools and so much more!
This well-maintained home boasts four generous sized bedrooms with BIR's and WIR to the master with ensuite, serviced by a central bathroom, Formal lounge leading you through to the spacious kitchen with an abundance of storage overlooking a vast meals and family area.
Never hesitate to entertain again with an elevated outdoor entertainment area perfect to host all your family and friends and an ample size backyard for the kids to play!
Further features include ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a well-manicured front garden.
All of this on an allotment of 510m2 approx.
Don't miss your chance.
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.

Perfect Opportunity
First home buyers will fall in love with the instantly appealing spaces, double garage, generous alfresco and easy to live with location offered by this delightful home. Moments from the pre and primary school, and within easy reach of Greenbrook Village, you can look to enjoy the benefits of three bedrooms, two bathrooms and a free flowing living meals before applying your own value adding contemporary touches.
- Split system climate control
- Fitted double garage (rear roller door)
- Shed
- Large alfresco
- Living flowing around to meals
- Ensuite to main bedroom
- Central to Westfield and Epping Plaza

Description:
Exceptional Real Estate that suits both Investors and Owner Occupiers
This prominent two-bedroom townhouse in the highly regarded locale of Epping offers an excellent design and well configured floorplan. With Epping being considered as one of Melbourne's last remaining affordable suburbs, this property is sure to impress a variety of buyers, including both investors and owner occupiers.
The home's impressive interior showcases two generous light-filled bedrooms, both well complimented by walk in robes. The well thought out design offers excellent separate lounge and separate kitchen/dining areas, whilst also consisting of a walk in laundry and excellent storage space. Moreover, the property boasts a large central bathroom and two separate toilets.
Externally, the property offers one car spot via rear access and is well complimented by great outdoor space that is ideal for entertaining.
This exceptional property is extremely well located, being a short drive to shops, transport, parklands and schools.
Insights: 8 Oriano Street, Epping VIC 3076 was last sold in 2017 and 7 other 2 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
Superbly Located
Is the competition expensive or is this just a great value? Being the lowest priced property, in the best suburb, there is no questions this is an affordable option. Whether you are a first home buyer, downsizer or investor this is great buy. Features: 1 bedroom with BIR, central bathroom, modern kitchen with S/S appliances, loads of bench space and open plan lounge/meals with polished floors, down lights, heating/cooling and rear courtyard. Currently let at $280.00 per week, on a month to month basis. Situated within close proximity to Epping train station, primary schools, Epping Plaza, parks and easy access to the Ring Road will satisfy the most astute home buyer/investor.

Description:
SOLD $567,000 BY VANYA KOSTUR
Exquisite Family Home with City Views!
Located in the ever popular Lyndarum Estate, only minutes away from all local facilities and future Aurora Centre, boasting 3 large bedrooms plus study (or 4th bedroom), open plan living areas, modern kitchen with stone bench tops, large stainless steel appliances, and walk in pantry, plus a spacious L-shape meals/family and lounge area.
Features include a low maintenance gardens, security alarm, intercom, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, gleaming polished floorboards, ducted vacuum, and more.
Highest quality on offer, be quick to inspect!
Land size: 310sqm approx.
Property Size: 21sq approx.
Age: New
Hot Water: Gas
Heating: Gas ducted
Cooling: Evaporative
Assessed Rental: $430 - $450 per week
Chattels: All fixtures and fittings as inspected
Preferred Settlement: 30/60 days
Deposit: 10% of the Purchase Price
Nearest Shops: Lyndarum and Aurora shopping precinct, Epping Plaza
Nearest Transport: Local bus service, Epping train station
AUCTION: Sat 9 Dec at 11:30am (Unless sold before)

Description:
Comfortable, Convenient And With Subdivision Potential
Just a 900m walk to the station, not much further to Westfield and closer still to parklands and the Secondary College, this neatly presented home on a 544m2 allotment (approx) offers fabulous living today with some enticing options for tomorrow.
Large living, meals over looked by a striking black and white kitchen and three bedrooms served by a timeless black and white bathroom sit well to the front of the large allotment, opening up options for astute buyers to take advantage of the generous dimensions and easy side access with a subdivision (stca).
Alternatively, with its ducted heating and cooling, NBN, garage and fabulous location this is the perfect place for a perfect start, and perhaps an extension over time (stca)

Description:
Everything You Need Set Amongst Everything You Want!
Experience a family lifestyle with this exquisite and impeccably presented family home offering an arrangement of spacious living areas including a large formal lounge and rear rumpus room this sleek and stylish design is set on 645m2 of land approx with a whopping 20m frontage one of the largest on the street.
Positioned in the prestigious Lyndarum estate of Epping, this lovely home offers a world of convenience with access to scenic walking/bike trails through sprawling parklands, St Mary of the Cross MacKillop and Epping Views Primary Schools, Epping North Medical Centre, Northern Hospital, Lyndarum Drive shops, Epping Plaza and Epping train station and bus services, all just minutes away, making this the perfect environment in which to raise your young family or up size to your dream home.
This wonderful home offers striking open plan living boasting a gourmet kitchen that is sure to ignite any chefs flame with stone bench tops, 900mm stainless steel appliances including dishwasher, glass splashbacks and ample cabinetry adjoining a large dining and family zone leading to the rear rumpus room, four generous-sized bedrooms all with built in robes plus master with a stylish full ensuite with spa bath, double vanities, stone bench tops and large walk in robe plus kids retreat or study for the kids to enjoy at the rear of the home.
Further features of this beautiful home include ducted heating and cooling via split system, extensive LED down lights, high ceilings, new carpet throughout, freshly painted, 2 and a half car garage with internal access and rear roller door and not to mention outside offering a nice decked area perfect for entertaining on the upcoming summer days with low maintenance front and rear gardens what more could you possibly want.
With plenty of wow factor on offer, this lovely home is just waiting for you to enjoy.
Insights: 32 Aries Drive, Epping VIC 3076 was last sold in 2017 and 99 other 4 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
Sensational, Spacious & Stylish Auction This Saturday @ 12:30pm
A favourable orientation gives this renovated single-level home an inviting, sun-kissed & light-filled ambience. Its positioning in a quiet and chiming cul-de-sac evokes a real sense of peace and privacy making it an ideal home for young families, investors, first home buyers or downsizers. A generous floor plan comprising of a spacious lounge area flows seamlessly to a modern kitchen with adjoining dining zone. Opening out to a large north-facing backyard, it's the perfect space for children, pets and outdoor entertaining. Warmly inviting with heating, cooling, rich floating floorboards and brand new carpets, this home has a luxurious yet practical feel. There are three robed bedrooms, one bathroom & full-sized laundry and a sizeable double lock-up-garage. In a terrific Mill Park Rise locale and within easy reach of both South Morang and Epping stations, Westfield Plenty Valley, handy bus links, schools and shopping options, this convenience on offer here will be hard to match.
Insights: 9 Benaud Place, Epping VIC 3076 was last sold in 2017 and 152 other 3 bedroom house in Epping have recently been sold.

Description:
The Great Entertainer!!
Great spaces and appealing outdoor surroundings with a sense of quality defines this beautiful home, located only minutes from the train station and Westfield shopping. Comprises of a formal entry, spacious living room, quality kitchen, dining room, family room and study. Upstairs includes a grand master bedroom with ensuite and a dressing room, a further 3 large bedrooms, family bathroom and a parents retreat with balcony. The home is further complemented with a double garage, covered outdoor area, ideal for the entertainer, lovely established gardens, ducted heating, evaporative cooling and a wood heater all on a generous allotment of 514sqm approx., situated in a quiet cul de sac.

Description:
Newly Renovated Gem
Located in easily the most sort after location in Epping is this immaculately presented family home. Offering 3 very good size bedrooms all with built in robes, spacious lounge and meals area newly renovated kitchen and bathroom. Huge decked entertainment area stretching the width of the house completed with large backyard for the kids to roam. Perfect for any first home buyer or a good prospect for any savvy investor to add to their portfolio. An easy walk to Greenbrook Village in one direction and South Morang station and Westfield Shopping Centre in the other. With the bus stop virtually at the front door, a fabulous future is assured, whatever path you take.

A LOT TO TALK ABOUT
All the services central Epping has to offer. Transport options with easy access to High Street, the Craigieburn bypass minutes away and train options all leaving the city in easy reach. This street facing unit has it all: 3 great bedrooms main with walk in robe, built in robes in the other bedrooms, central bathroom and 2 great sized living areas ensure this home will impress. Having schools, Epping Pacific, Northern Hospital and High Street, the appeal to all buyers will be strong. This bright open floorplan with garage has plenty to like. What are you waiting for? Come along and see for yourself.

Description:
Fully Updated Surprisingly Affordable
Recently updated with fresh paint, engineered timber flooring, striking kitchen where black and white cabinetry wrapping around a stainless steel range and three bedrooms are served by a contemporary bathroom featuring floor to ceiling tiles and a one piece glass walk in shower…there's nothing to do but move in here and enjoy! Landscaped gardens with a feature stone wall wrap around the house to create a fenced sanctuary secure for the kids and their pets. Along with the bus at the corner, Hendersons Road Reserve, schools and Greenbrook Village a few minutes walk away, it enjoys easy access to Westfield and the South Morang Station.

Description:
Development Opportunity
Introducing an outstanding development site for current and future developers (STCA), this property offers endless opportunity with approved plans for two townhouses or the choice to improve, subdivide or build your dream home.
Currently stands a well presented three bedroom home on the 594 metre block which you can choose to live or lease while you plan your future.
Features include three good sized bedrooms with built-in robes, a spacious living room and open plan kitchen and dining. There are polished timber floors throughout, ducted heating and a large back yard with direct access to walking tracks.
Situated in a quiet residential court you will be a short walk to St Monica's College, St Peter's Primary, Epping Primary and Secondary, NMIT, Pacific Epping and Epping train station.

Description:
A Golden Opportunity
Located within walking distance to local schools, shops, cafes, public transport, parkland, casa d' abruzzo club, Lyndarum Town Centre, Epping Plaza and only minutes away from the Epping Train Station. This beautiful home features 4 bedrooms, master with ensuite & WIR, modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances & dishwasher adjoining open plan living area. Further features include the comforts of roller shutters, alarm, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, down lights, video intercom, landscaped garden, remote control garage with internal & rear access, low maintenance & much more.
Whether you're looking for your first home or a solid investment opportunity, you simply cannot afford to miss this one!

Description:
Loveable Location, Flawless Lifestyle
Situated in one of Epping's most demanded locations and built by JG King, this family home is positioned for the perfect lifestyle with easy access to all districts amenities including Wallaby Childcare, St Mary of the Cross Mackillop, Aurora General Store & Café, Public Transport along with local Tennis courts.
This gem showcases three bedrooms, two with BIR's plus a WIR and ensuite in the Master. A central well-appointed kitchen coupled with a dishwasher, stone benchtops, 900mm stainless steel appliances and a walk-in pantry, which overlooks the main dining, two large separate living zones and the undercover decked alfresco area perfect for special occasions with family and friends.
Additional bonuses include; Steel frame home, ducted heating, evaporative cooling, second living or study, motorised roller shutters at the front of home, Roman blinds, optic fibre connection, recyclable water, storage throughout, minimal maintenance yard, internal and external access to both laundry and double garage.
An easy decision for any investor and dream home for first home buyers and families. Dreams do come true. Don't miss out on this fantastic opportunity!
Please come and see me at one of our offices below to discuss your real estate needs.

Description:
Ideal for a young family or first home buyer
In a quiet original pocket of Epping sits this proudly lived in 3 bedroom home with 2 bathrooms (including Master with ensuite), plus recent additions that makes it comfortable living. Situated in the heart of Epping only minutes away from all your local amenities such as St Monica's College, St Peters Primary, Epping Train Station, Pacific Epping Shopping Centre, Greenbrook shops and so much more!
Positioned on a great size of aproxx 613sqm, your new home is enriched with premium size land. Entertain friends and family all year round, with a well maintained and designed alfresco area plus plenty of space in the backyard. Housing a large single car garage plus a storage shed in the back, this home is perfect for any investor, first home buyer or a young family who’s trying to get their foot in the door of Epping’s booming real estate market.
